name: Estropipate
title: Estropipate
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent estropipate medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Medication, Ordered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with semantic clinical drugs (concepts associated with component, form and strength); generic; human use only; prescribable; estropipate only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes branded drugs; components or ingredient only; non-prescribable; estropipate in combination with other medications.)
